tutorial.speak:
To configure navigation links and sidebar tabs for your live stream, start from the Dashboard and click on "Sermons" in the left navigation menu.
From the Sermons page, click on the "Live Stream Times" tab to access stream configuration.
On the Live Stream Times page, click the "Settings" button to configure your streaming page options.
In the Settings page, you'll see three sections: Navigation Links for header links, Sidebar Tabs for interactive elements, and External Resources. To add a navigation link, click the "Add" button in the Navigation Links section.
Enter your link details. For this example, we're adding "Church Calendar" with the URL "/church-calendar". You can organize links under submenus by selecting a folder like "Home" from the Menu Organization section.
After selecting the Home folder, you'll see a confirmation that your link will be placed under that submenu. Click "Save Link" to add it.
The new Church Calendar link now appears under the Home navigation link. To add a sidebar tab, click the "Add" button in the Sidebar Tabs section.
Enter the tab name, select an icon, and choose the page type. For an External URL, enter the full web address. In this example, we're adding a "Womens Retreat Registration" tab with an external registration form URL. Click "Save Tab" when done.
Your streaming settings now show all configured navigation links and sidebar tabs. These will appear on your live streaming page for viewers to access additional resources and interactive features.
